Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 258th overall pick, by St. Louis in 2012...
Injured on 7/6/2014 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 8/25/2015, off Zack Von Rosenberg (NYN)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/5/2015, off Zack Von Rosenberg (NYN)...
Traded from St. Louis to San Diego on 2/8/2019 (Going to SDN: SS S. Olivera. Going to STL: RF C. Lucero)...
Injured on 9/21/2019 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/17/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $810,000 per year...
Injured on 7/3/2021 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
